author: cheapie
long_description:
Kicks players that send 3 or more messages that are at least 16 characters long and at least half capital letters. A warning is sent after each message fitting these criteria as well.  
Players with the 'basic_privs' privilege are exempt.  
  
Do note that this is a pretty old mod and was originally a one-off thing for one specific server - as such, it's not very configurable and probably not up to the sort of standards that other such mods may be.
name: dropthecaps
short_description: Kicks players that spew all-caps messages
title: Drop The Caps
